homepage.heroSubtitle: Rediscover your serenity with a personalized therapeutic approach.

aboutIntro.heading: Welcome, I'm Nathalie JEAN
aboutIntro.paragraph: Passionate about manual therapies and energetic balance, my mission is to guide you on the path to well-being. I use a gentle and attentive approach to help you release tension and rediscover your vitality.

cards.title: Stress & Anxiety
cards.description: To soothe the nervous system, reduce mental load, and find a state of deep, lasting calm.

cards.title: Physical Pain
cards.description: To effectively relieve back pain, muscle tension, migraines, and joint discomfort.

cards.title: Balance & Vitality
cards.description: To improve sleep, boost digestion, and recharge the body with vital energy for overall wellness.

cards.title: Maternity Support
cards.description: To support women during pregnancy and postpartum by relieving common ailments and promoting recovery.

cards.title: Digestive Issues
cards.description: To harmonize digestive functions, reduce bloating, and improve transit naturally.

cards.title: Immune Support
cards.description: To strengthen the body's natural defenses, prevent seasonal illnesses, and increase overall resilience.

whatIsShiatsuSection.heading: What is Shiatsu?
whatIsShiatsuSection.paragraph: Shiatsu is a manual therapy of Japanese origin that uses finger and palm pressure across the entire body. It aims to restore the circulation of vital energy, or 'Qi', to soothe ailments, revitalize the body, and calm the mind.

whoIsItForSection.heading: Support for Everyone

testimonials.quote: To manage daily stress, improve sleep, and rediscover a state of general well-being.

staticReviews.text: To try it is to love it.

I saw Nathalie for Shiatsu sessions for almost 2 years and I warmly recommend her. Her experience is undeniable, but it's also her personality that will make you come back! A wonderful encounter and a definite sense of well-being after leaving the sessions. Thank you, Nathalie!
Excellent practitioner, experienced and very attentive. Bravo!
Very dynamic, effective, attentive, and gives great advice. I recommend her.
A warm welcome and attentive listening, you feel confident from the very first minutes. A sense of well-being felt from the first appointment. Thank you so much, Nathalie!
